Property Location
When you stay at Motel Lodge in Rockhampton, you'll be near the airport and convenient to Rockhampton Botanic Gardens and Zoo and Archer Park Station & Steam Train Museum. This motel is within close proximity of Pilbeam Theatre and Rockhampton Art Gallery.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 15 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and LCD televisions are provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms with showers are provided. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers and irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Take advantage of the motel's room service (during limited hours).
